meanings.sent1: The lulling music helped the baby fall asleep.
meanings.sent2: The sound of the rain was lulling me into a peaceful state.
meanings.sent3: The lulling effect of the gentle breeze made everyone feel relaxed.
meanings.sent4: The lulling rhythm of the waves was like a gentle hug from nature.
meanings.sent5: The lulling scent of lavender filled the room, creating a tranquil atmosphere.

meanings.definition: To cause to sleep or rest peacefully
meanings.sent1: The mother's soft singing was lulling her baby to sleep.
meanings.sent2: The gentle rocking motion of the cradle was lulling the infant into a peaceful slumber.
meanings.sent3: The rhythmic sound of the train passing by was lulling the passengers into a nap.
meanings.sent4: The repetitive sound of the ticking clock was lulling him into a deep sleep.
meanings.sent5: The soothing voice of the storyteller was lulling the children into dreamland.
